coffees.title: Arabica Ethiopia
coffees.description: A delicate coffee with floral aromas and citrus notes. Ideal for those who prefer a light taste.

coffees.title: Arabica Colombia
coffees.description: An exceptionally balanced coffee with subtle fruity flavors and delicate acidity.

coffees.title: Arabica Brazil Santos
coffees.description: An aromatic coffee with nutty and chocolate notes, perfect for espresso.

coffees.title: Arabica Guatemala
coffees.description: A coffee with a complex flavor profile, featuring caramel and chocolate notes. Perfect for an afternoon relaxation.

coffees.title: Arabica Kenya AA
coffees.description: A bold coffee with intense fruity flavors and mild acidity. Ideal for special occasions.

coffees.title: Arabica Peru
coffees.description: An organic coffee with a smooth taste, featuring caramel and honey notes.

coffees.title: Arabica Sumatra
coffees.description: A coffee with a full, earthy taste with spice and chocolate notes. Perfect for connoisseurs.

coffees.title: Robusta India
coffees.description: A strong coffee with an intense flavor and high caffeine content. Perfect for a morning boost.

coffees.title: Espresso Blend
coffees.description: A carefully selected blend of Arabica and Robusta, perfect for making strong espresso.

coffees.title: Arabica Costa Rica
coffees.description: A bright coffee with citrus and honey notes. Perfect for those who enjoy subtle aromas.
